Row.Text: Eliminates extra [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from an [ICON_OCCUPIED] Occupied City. Reduces cost of acquiring new Tiles with [ICON_GOLD] Gold or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture based upon the city's [ICON_PEACE] Faith output.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine. Reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Religious Unrest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Shrine.

Eliminates extra [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from an [ICON_OCCUPIED] Occupied City. Reduces cost of acquiring new Tiles with [ICON_GOLD] Gold or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture based upon the city's [ICON_PEACE] Faith output.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +1 [ICON_JFD_HEALTH] Health.

Eliminates extra [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from an [ICON_OCCUPIED] Occupied City. Reduces cost of acquiring new Tiles with [ICON_GOLD] Gold or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture based upon the city's [ICON_PEACE] Faith output.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense, [ICON_RES_JFD_SAFFRON] Saffron, and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +1 [ICON_JFD_HEALTH] Health.

Reduces cost of acquiring new Tiles with [ICON_GOLD] Gold or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture based upon the city's [ICON_PEACE] Faith output.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense, [ICON_RES_JFD_SAFFRON] Saffron, and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

It cannot be tolerated that the ruler of the Russian people would be below that of Kings in other realms. Today, we declare ourselves Tsar - sovereign ruler of the Russian people and her empire, answerable and accountable only to almighty God. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Muscovy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must control 3 foreign Capitals. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Russia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds St. Basil's in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

It cannot be tolerated that the ruler of the Russian people would be below that of Kings in other realms. Today, we declare ourselves Tsar - sovereign ruler of the Russian people and her empire, answerable and accountable only to almighty God. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Muscovy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Government. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 50% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty. [ICON_BULLET]Must control 3 foreign Capitals. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Russia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Passes the [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Absolute (Executive) Reform without incurring Cooldown. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds St. Basil's in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

It cannot be tolerated that the ruler of the Russian people is but a mere Grand Prince; below that of Kings in other realms. Today, we declare ourselves Tsar - sovereign ruler of the Russian people and her empire, answerable and accountable only to almighty God. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Russia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds St. Basil's in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

It cannot be tolerated that the ruler of the Russian people is but a mere Grand Prince; below that of Kings in other realms. Today, we declare ourselves Tsar - sovereign ruler of the Russian people and her empire, answerable and accountable only to almighty God. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Russia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds St. Basil's in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
{1_LeaderName} has consolidated his power over the Rus' and has declared himself Tsar of All the Russias.
+10% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty during [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages. Free Cathedrals in this city.

The Cathedral of Vasily the Blessed, commonly known as the Cathedral of Saint Basil, is a former church in Red Square in Moscow, Russia. The building, now a museum, is officially known as the Cathedral of the Intercession of the Most Holy Theotokos on the Moat or Pokrovsky Cathedral. It was built from 1555 on orders from Ivan the Terrible and commemorates the capture of Kazan and Astrakhan. A world famous landmark, it has been the hub of growth since the 14th century and was the tallest building in the city until the completion of the Ivan the Great Bell Tower in 1600.
[NEWLINE]"And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and there was a rainbow round about the throne, in sight like unto an emerald."[NEWLINE] - Revelation, 4:3 - 4:4[NEWLINE]

The hereditary nobility is the biggest threat to our power. We must send the Oprichniki to purge the state of those nobles whose loyalty is questionable. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Muscovy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Medieval Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance is reset in all cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age cost increases with each city that you own.[ENDCOLOR]

The hereditary nobility is the biggest threat to our power. We must send the Oprichniki to purge the state of those nobles whose loyalty is questionable. {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivDesc} has unleashed the Oprichnik upon his cities to terrorize his subjects.
The people of {1_CityName} have begun drinking a strange new concoction of sweet honey and beer! They call the drink Medovukha.

Word has reached our court of the creation of the printing press - a machine said to be capable of replicating written works many times faster than any man. Our courtiers have already begun contemplating what worth this machine might have in increasing the distribution of religious and legal texts throughout the empire. We should consider whether the printing press might have a place in our people's lives.[NEWLINE]
Turn away this devilry. It is a waste of gold.
We have refused to adopt the Printing Press.
We have adopted the Printing Press.

We have learned that several noblemen at {1_CityName} are conspiring against us. There is a plot to overthrow us, and there is almost certainly irrefutable evidence to back this up. Probably.[NEWLINE]
Those wretches need to be taught a lesson.
We have mercilessly set the city of {1_CityName} to light for their perceived transgressions.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance {1_CityName} will go into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
We have not followed up on suspicions that noblemen from {1_CityName} are conspiring against us.
We have not followed up on suspicions that noblemen from {1_CityName} are conspiring against us. Unfortunately for us, these suspicions seem to have been correct, and the city has revolted.
{1_LeaderName} has started a bloody massacre of the nobility in the {2_CivAdj} city of {3_CityName}.
